description: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by July 4, 2023 at 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. full_summary:
==========

### Tender Announcement: DefenceX

**Reference Number:** WS3189418126 - Doc4014958265
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Publication Date:** May 31, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** July 4, 2023, 2 P.M. EDT
**Expected Contract Start Date:** January 8, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date:** [To be Determined]

### Tender Status

This tender has expired.

### Category and Type

**Procurement Category:** SRV
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Not applicable

### Cloud Platforms and Access

The bidding process will be available on the Ariba Discovery Portal.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to bidders who are certified under the following trade agreements:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

### Bidding Process

Submission deadline: This is the third Request for Information (RFI) pertaining to the DefenceX project. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Canada Buys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the new tender closing date of July 4, 2023, at 14:00 EDT.

* Late bids will be considered non-responsive.
* Solicitation number: WS3189418126
* Regions of Delivery: Canada
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* End User Entities: Department of National Defence (DND)
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Forest, Alex (SPAC/PSPC) (they/them)
	+ Email: alex.forests@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

[End of Tender Announcement] 

Please find the given tender request information in **http://
